EmailTemplate.name: Successful Re-enrolment
EmailTemplate.subject: Successful Re-enrolment - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am pleased to advise you that you have been successfully re-enrolled in your degree.
There has been a systemic issue with the Web Enrolment System which is presently being investigated. Nevertheless, I have checked your enrolment in CALLISTA and can confirm that you have successfully re-enrolled for 2017.
Should you have any concerns or require further assistance, you are welcome to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
